original: 河南洛陽人，种邵之父。董卓死後，李傕、郭汜等率兵攻破長安，殺司徒王允，搶進皇宮。种拂力阻亂兵入宮，被李傕所殺。
text: People from Luoyang, Henan, father of Chong Shao. After Dong Zhuo's death, Li Wei, Guo Ben and others led their troops to break Chang'an, kill Situ Wang Yun, and rush into the palace. This kind of force prevented the insurgents from entering the palace and was killed by Li Zhang.
